title: Help me pls. ;(
body: Hello guys. So I just read a forum on how to get the free Unchained Alistar skin and you get it from subscribing to the official League of Legends YouTube channel. I went and subscribed and didnt receive an Alistar code.  Can someone help me please!!!

replies.body: Since this issue deals directly with redeeming content on your account, I suggest [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our specialists can help you out.
Just buy him, hes cheap as hell.
